revised_title: Obituary Notices of Fellows Deceased: William Baly, George Bishop, and Sir William Cubitt
tldr: This article provides obituary notices for three notable fellows of the Royal Society: William Baly, a physician and prison medicine expert; George Bishop, an astronomer and observatory owner; and Sir William Cubitt, a civil engineer and inventor. Each individual's contributions to their respective fields are highlighted, as well as their election into the Royal Society and their overall impact on society.
